name: threat-group-1314

procedures: T1021.002::[Threat Group-1314] actors mapped network drives using net use.
T1059.003::[Threat Group-1314] actors spawned shells on remote systems on a victim network to execute commands.
T1072::[Threat Group-1314] actors used a victim's endpoint management platform, Altiris, for lateral movement.
T1078.002::[Threat Group-1314] actors used compromised domain credentials for the victim's endpoint management platform, Altiris, to move laterally.

description: [Threat Group-1314](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0028) is an unattributed threat group that has used compromised credentials to log into a victim's remote access infrastructure. (Citation: Dell TG-1314)
